document_data.mainbody:
Laddie was an shepherds dog that belonged to Ivrin of the Wild Pastures in the Delimbiyr Vale circa 1372 DR.
Unlike most other dogs, Laddies sense of smell was quite inept on account of the hounds "frightful allergies."
In the , the Wild Pastures west of Liams Hold hamlet began experiencing uncanny disappearances of cattle, sometimes in the middle of the day. Laddie and its master Ivrin the Shepherd witnessed one such disappearance firsthand. The shepherds favorite cow Betty seemingly stopped existing after the observer duo heard strange giggling. Goblin tribe in service of the devil Gorgomorz armed with shaman brews of invisibility were to blame.
